Text: Escape to Costa Rica dxiclghlHeres How You Can Have a Brand New Credit Profile in Hours The Best Part is Its Legal Ethical and Fully GUARANTEED Dear Friend Do you have bad credit judgements bankruptcies or any other credit problems Does it seem like your bad credit is holding you back from qualifying for a major credit card car loan or even a department store card Are you sick of the embarrassment of being rejected at your attempts to get any credit at all If so Ive got some extremely good news for you I Will Show You Precisely How to Get a New Separate Clean Credit File and it will be Clear of Any Past Credit History And its LEGAL It doesnt matter if you have judgements It doesnt matter if youve filed for bankruptcy It doesnt matter if youve been foreclosed It doesnt matter if you have a tax lien It doesnt matter if have been a slow payer in the past It Doesnt Matter Because Your Credit File Will Be Completely New And Completely Independent Of Any Negative Past File With my kitwithin the next days you will quickly and easily Get ALL Major Credit Cards Learn Basic and Advanced Credit Billing Techniques Get Bank Loans FAST and Simple Get Mortgages NOW Have AAA Credit on Your Brand New File in Days Get INSTANT Credit From Real Department Stores Car Loans FAST and SIMPLE And much much more CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE newcreditfileindexhtmlmarketingidcr This email was sent to you by Coconut Bay Marketing Services in full compliance with all existing and proposed email legislation You may automatically remove yourself from any future mailings by clicking here removehtml The reply address on this email was active at the time this email was sent Coconut Bay Marketing Services SJO PO Box Miami FL
